name: Eddie Floyd
description: '''Eddie Lee Floyd''' (born June 25, 1937) is an American [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] and [[Soul music|soul]] singer and songwriter, best known for his work on the [[Stax Records|Stax]] record label in the 1960s and 1970s, including a No. 1 R&B hit song, "[[Knock on Wood (Eddie Floyd song)|Knock on Wood]]".
